project.name: Gridiron Franchise Simulator
project.description: American football franchise simulation game built as a mobile-first PWA

phase.name: Project Initialization & Dependencies
phase.description: Set up the foundational project structure with all required technologies

git.name: football
git.note: Local git config for this project only

tasks.name: Configure Git for Project
tasks.description: Set up local Git configuration for this project with the correct email
tasks.notes: Local config only - won't affect other projects

tasks.name: Create Next.js Project
tasks.description: Initialize Next.js 15 with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, ESLint, and App Router
tasks.notes: Next.js 16 does not exist yet. Using Next.js 15 (latest stable). Will update when 16 releases.

tasks.description: Set up shadcn/ui component library with default configuration

tasks.description: Add essential UI components for the application
commands: npx shadcn@latest add button card dialog dropdown-menu input label select tabs toast scroll-area separator badge progress sheet

commands: npm install zustand zod react-hook-form @hookform/resolvers lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge

tasks.name: Create Environment Configuration
tasks.description: Set up environment variables for Supabase connection

tasks.description: Create PWA manifest and configure next.config.ts for service worker

tasks.name: Set Up Supabase Client
tasks.description: Create Supabase client utilities for server and client components
